misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation
description: The URL being printed is based on the value of the 'choice' variable, which is user-provided. If the user provides a value greater than 1, the URL will be printed as "https://www.google.com", which may not be the intended or secure URL.
recommendation: To fix this vulnerability, the code should ensure that the URL being printed is a trusted and secure URL, rather than relying on user-provided input.
